Message.Title: Google code hacked and cracked - global shut down
Message.Msg: Like the financial servicez industry, the internet too iz bot driven and interconnected in wayz unimaginable. This little newz item az it relates to google iz gonna take puny AWS right the fvck out and murder the world of online shopping and web servicez. In the blink of a robot, we will be cast into the stone age az all thingz digital collapse. Thats why you have to have your GTC "buy to cover" limit orderz set az low az possible AHEAD of the internet crash that will coincide with / escalate / or create the crash of bot driven digital bit coin markets. You will not be able to enter your orderz or reach your broker diring the middle of it. Your limit orderz will be set to trip When system switchez attempt to reclose and come back on line in between shut shut downz. Shorts with low buy limit orderz and daring dip buying longz with low buy orderz will be considered to be heroz az they will be the only bidz and buyerz on the planet when the meyhem insuez .... Once sytemz are back on line , you can reopen your shorts on the 'bounce' before the 'controled' collapse. There'z gonna be lots of wealth to transfer az the black swan swoops down scalping the accounts of the many and deposits the money into the accounts of the few that understand and are prepared.... NOTE TO OPTION BUYING CRACKHEADZ: optionz will be entirely useless in this environment, they will fail to trade and go to 0. DO NOT USE CRACK OPTIONZ TO PREPARE FOR THE IMPENDING DISASTER. That would be like a peice of paper stating that you have access to drinking water vs actually owning a working well during a global water shortage.

Message.Title: Also - you should have at least 2 months of your house hold or business cash flow stuffed into your matressez next to a sawed off shotg
Message.Msg: When the internet locks up, ATMz, digital gas pumps, etc will fail to operate.... What you need ahead of internet armeggodon Canned Food Plenty of Drinking water Seeds to grow food A stash of cash (hopefully it will still have some value despite bernanke doing hiz all out best to murder the dollar) Some precious metalz - use your jewlrey no need to buy added precious metalz Supplemental heat and electricity separate from the power grid preset LOW buy to cover GTC limit orderz on your shorts Passports / za paperz to travel in the open Weaponz - gunz , knivez, and crossbowz to shoot zombiez and hunt for food. Some karosene, gasoline, and a propane tank Thats about all sybs can think of .....

Topic.Title: Also - you should have at least 2 months of your house hold or business cash flow stuffed into your matressez next to a sawed off shotg

Message.Msg: You're clearly an indoor dog Sybil. You buy hQ camping water filration systems (like those of us who camp in the backcountry do... You cannot carry enough water for extended periods and you will soon be nomadic. High quality tent, external frame backpack, fishing pole (much easierto get food fishing), and garden/vegetable seed packs (if you find a safe home base) :-) If it comes to all that, life on earth is hell and all you precautions will means nothing. We are going to witness a big deflationary collapse (so the banks can get control of physical gold from forced liquidations) and then a heathly inflation which rebalances global purchasing power, backed by fractional gold standard. It is the only stable path out of this mess. The intergenerational wealth transfer to the boomers will be reversed, financial asset holders will see worth drop reducing the gap/disparity, nominal incomes will rise (but not until currency markets reflect fundamentals) and balance will be restored. Those that rotate from financial trading scams to productive assets positioned to meet critical global needs will win.

Message.Title: AMZN peaked on Jul 26th
Message.Msg: Just a matter of time now as more and more states follow CA and TX lead and force Amazon to collect sales taxes. The showroom effect goes away and stores like Best Buy and Wal-Mart see their in-store sales improve

Topic.Title: I Followed Sybiljar's Advice (and their cut/paste skills)

Message.Msg: I'm shorting your BS posts, i.e. you saying one thing and doing another. The tickets, the point is they are easy to fake. I do agree with the general premise of our economy but probably not quite as extreme as you. Are things f'ed up here in the US, dang straight, more municipalities going bankrupts etc. I also agree with tech in terms of the lack of faith in the markets. Fundamentals in any individual company don't matter until they do. That's for those that have very little of them like this one and are way too high and that's also for some suppressed companies. I believe in fundies and you don't. My best investment have been driven by not good but great fundamentals.

Message.Msg: The markets are driven by the supply / demand mechanics of bit coin stox and robots that sniff out leverage in them - period.
I wonder if Jeff B will find another company to buy to justify selling more shares
